name: Boho Valance Macrame Curtains for Windows Macrame Valance for Bedroom Livingroom Boho Decor Wall Hanging, 1 Panel 52" W x 21" L

product_description: Handmade, natural, 100% cotton. A unique handwoven large macrame curtain/macrame closet door curtain,so may have slight variations in size. Bohemian macrame curtain will make any space more cozy and romantic.Will fit perfectly any window - kitchen, dinning room, living room, or door frame and will give dreamy bohemian feel.

name: 2 Pack Boho Tassel Kitchen Valances for Windows Modern Farmhouse Cotton Linen Valance Curtains Topper Country Rustic Bathroom Small Window Treatment Bohemian Decor (55x15 inch, Natural)
short_description: BOHO TASSEL DESIGN: Our valance curtains are made of cotton linen textured and polyester blended fabric,along with beautiful fringe edge at the bottom. The material is heavy yet light and airy, which is soft to the touch and hangs nicely, give a boho look. BOHEMIAN FARMHOUSE DECOR: The macrame and the neutral color go well with cottage, modern farmhouse theme or French country decor, perfect addition to the small windows for kitchen cabinet, living room, bedroom, bathroom, basement, cabin and RV camper. SOFTEN THE LIGHT: This linen textured valance softened the sunlight but did not block the sun completely. It offer just perfect amount of visibility to look out but not have the blazing sun. PRODUCT INFORMATION: Package contains 2 panels of window curtain valance. Each panels measure 55" width by 15" length(tassel length is not include). Constructed with 2.5" rod pocket which fit basic or decorative curtain rods. EASY CARE: Our kitchen curtains are durable with sturdy fabric and tidy stitching. Machine washable in cold water in gentle circle and tumble dry in low setting. Do not bleach. Wrinkles due to package will be took out after ironing or steaming.
product_description: The linen textured kitchen curtain gives a casual vibe to the room and make the windows look more finished. These curtains are perfect for a country home look! Perfect for cabin, laundry room, kitchen window above sink or cover top of blinds in the living room if you are going for a rustic farmhouse look! These small curtains allowed so much natural light into the kitchen but still given a sense of privacy. Offer just enough privacy and still let's a fair amount of light through.

name: FRAMICS Farmhouse Valance Curtains, Boho Cotton Linen Kitchen Valance, Rustic Button Window Valance for Kitchen Bathroom Bedroom, Country Rod Pocket Valances for Windows, Linen Color, 52 x 18 Inch
short_description: Cotton Linen Button Valance: Our farmhosue valance curtain is made of premium cotton linen material, which is durable and comfortable. This country valance curtain measures 52" W x 18" L, with a 2.4" rod pocket that fits standard 1.5" curtain rods. Our valance curtains for kitchen ensure your easy installation and smooth gliding across standard or decorative rods Versatile: You can hang these rod pocket curtain on your kitchen, bathroom or other rooms. The adaptability of our rustic small window curtain ensures that no matter where they hang, they'll enhance the aesthetic and atmosphere of your space Easy to Care: Simply place them in your washing machine on a gentle cycle with cold water to preserve their pristine look. For best results, wash them separately from other items. After washing, tumble dry on a low setting to keep the fabric soft and wrinkle-free.

name: VOGOL Decorative Tie Up Curtains for Girls Room, Lovely Leaf Print Small Window Curtain Valance Top Pocket 18 Inch Long, One Panel, Green Leaves, Tie52x18

The Tie-Up Valance is a one-piece valance that includes two adjustable ties and can be adjusted to the height you desire. Two Ties can be freely switched to meet your needs for decoration and lighting. Perfect for the small window in the kitchen, bathroom, living room and bedroom. EASY CARE: Wash with cold water in the machine, tumble dry. Quick iron or steam clean when needed.

name: HIG 2 Pack Camel Ruffle Window Valances – Handcrafted Bow Tie Blackout Curtain Valances for Windows/Bathroom/Living Room/Bedroom, Farmhouse Decorative Privacy Kitchen Valance, 52"x18"(N60047)
short_description: Exquisite Hand-Sewn Bow-Tie Design – Each Curtain Valance features delicate, hand-sewn bow-tie embellishments, adding a touch of romance and elegance to any room. This detailed design complements a variety of decor styles, making it perfect for a Bedroom Window Valance or Kitchen Valance to elevate your space with charm. Elegant Layered Ruched Texture – These Window Valances showcase a naturally ruched texture with rich layers, creating a soft and dimensional look that transforms any window into a focal point. Measuring 52"x18", these valances work beautifully as Kitchen Valances, adding decorative sophistication to your home decor for a warm, inviting ambiance. Effective Blackout for Privacy and Comfort – These window valances are designed with excellent blackout capabilities, significantly reducing sunlight penetration to create a dimmer, more private indoor environment. Perfect for spaces where you need extra privacy and light control, they enhance comfort while adding an elegant decorative touch to any room. Flexible Installation Options – This set of Curtain Valances includes dual rod pocket options, allowing versatile installation styles to match different decor needs. The double rod pocket design makes installation easy and flexible, catering to various preferences. These valances are perfect as both Kitchen Valances and Living Room Window Valances, adding elegance and utility. Durable and Easy-Care Premium Fabric – Made from high-quality brushed polyester, these valances are soft to the touch, fade-resistant, and retain their vibrancy even after multiple washes. Ideal for use in different rooms such as the kitchen or bedroom, the solid color design effortlessly complements various decor styles, ensuring long-lasting beauty and functionality.
